pages.text: In a simlar manner as $(l:magnets/magnets)magnets$(), electromagnets can pull items toward the player, but at the cost of energy. $(br2)Electromagnets use the tiers in Thermal Expansion; Leadstone, Hardened, Reinforced, Signalum, and Resonant, each having a different level of energy storage and range.
Each tier has more energy storage and range than the prior.
